about_the_game:
Gameplay

Office racer is new type of racing game where you race around different levels. You race like a furious head to find the finish lines to beat the game. Its a fun racing game and there is a cool backround music bringing the atmosphere. The car controls from most realistic car driving simulators. You drive with a RC formula car fast as you can win the game. You can meet the old man named Winston in the game. There is a 5 different levels to race. You can find secrets finish lines on the levels. RACE FAST AS YOU CAN!

Features

  • RC CAR
  • AMAZING CAR CONTROLS
  • DRIFTING
  • REAL CAR SOUNDS

Controls

  • W=GAS
  • S=BRAKE
  • A=LEFT
  • D=RIGHT
  • SPACE=HANDBREAK
  • C=CHANGE CAMERA ANGLE
  • R=RESTART THE LEVEL

Its a fun racing game and there is a cool backround music bringing the atmosphere. The car controls from most realistic car driving simulators. name: Office Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD Rx 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Rx 590
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Office racer is a little racing game where you race around your office. RACE FAST AS YOU CAN! Get the racing started! You race like a furious head to win the competition. It a fun racing game and there is a cool backround music bringing the atmosphere. You drive with a RCformula car fast as you can.
